data.message: Really too old to be acting like this honestly.     Time to grow up.  And a little class wouldn’t hurt at this age either.

replies.message: Yet you support a President that goes to war by tweeting and grabbing females by the pussy
Better than a president who lets in exploding terrorists that want death to people who aren't like them

*rubs chin* when were there any terrorist attacks in the states during those 8 years? Or are you assuming that the Muslim refugees were all just terrorist?

Can't cure stupid.
But the word son of a bitch or pussy doesn't bother you? You have got to be fucking kidding me??
Yup, there’s the class I was talking about.  Lmao.    Poor snowflake
It's his job to act that way so telling him to grow up is like telling somebody in the work field whose 65 to retire so they can give their job to somebody who's younger

Please. He said what every rational, decent human being is feeling. I am furious and sad at what Trump is doing to my country. I felt MM’s anger. Everything he said was completely valid in the eyes of the many who don’t have blinders on. It’s also tough to deal in a classy, respectful manner with a man like Trump, who doesn’t know what either of those traits entail. He’s a horrible person, and he’s a dangerous and unfit “leader.” I have no patience for anyone who supports him either. I’m glad MM used his voice.
This bitch believes the Vegas conspiracy stories. Just another dumb cunt. Hope you get caught in the next one
Joseph Fauj your an asshole.  Lmao.
I absolutely love that your pissed he won!!
I thought the same thing. The whole thing is rather childish...
Daniel Cheng yeah, by having a president that bans people that aren't like him.
You should forward that message to your President.
